subject: Economy
question_en: What does GDP stand for in economics?
question_hi: एक्सप्रेसमेंट्स में GDP क्या होता है।
explanation_en:
Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is the total value of goods and services produced within a country's geographical boundaries in a given period of time. It is the sum of consumption, government expenditure, and net exports minus net imports.

विमानित राज्य की आरंभी योजना
explanation_en_short: GDP (Gross Domestic Product) represents the total value of goods and services produced by a country within its geographical borders. It includes consumption, government expenditure, and net exports minus net imports.
